document_data.name: Abyssal Spark
document_data.mainbody: '''Abyssal sparks''' were [[elemental]]s of [[fire]] from the [[Abyss]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Tyranny's Perilous Bastion|24,26}}{{Cite organized play/LFR/Tyranny's Perilous Bastion|19}}
document_data.Description: They looked like bright bursts of Abyssal flame that had come to life.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Tyranny's Perilous Bastion|20}}
document_data.Combat: Abyssal sparks could use their pulsing fire to burn their foes. They were delicate and easy to destroy, but this led them to immolate in a fiery explosion. Any [[demon]] caught in this burst found itself briefly shielded from any incoming attacks, and so abyssal sparks made a point of staying nearby their demonic allies in combat.
document_data.Ecology: Sparks had been encountered in swarms and alongside demons. They were known to emerge from ''[[portal]]s'' to the Abyss.
